1. CDPHE stands by decision to euthanize 11 puppies after another tested positive for rabies  9News.com KUSA
  2. 'My heart is broken': Litter of puppies euthanized after rabies exposure at rescue event  USA TODAY
  3. No human cases of rabies so far as second puppy from Colorado adoption event tests positive  The Colorado Sun
  4. What’s stupider than rehoming rabid pit bull puppies? Denying the risk.  Animals 24-7
  5. Colorado health officials order additional puppies from adoption event to be quarantined amid rabies  CBS News
